content:
*** HoTT 2023
*** Second International Conference on Homotopy Type Theory
*** Carnegie Mellon University
*** 22nd-25th May 2023

The Programme is now available here:
https://hott.github.io/HoTT-2023//programme/
Registration will close on 14 May.
Until then you can still register via the website:
https://hott.github.io/HoTT-2023//registration/
With best regards,
Steve (on behalf of the Scientific and Organising Committees)
Hi Steve, will the talks be recorded/streamed anywhere? I can't find any information about this on the conference's website (but maybe I simply missed it)
